ezRNAseq
  • Reference

Read Counting

Count reads by gene and by exon

count_reads(bam = NULL, ext = ".bam", by = c("gene", "exon"),
  samples.annotation = NULL, result.dir = "COUNT", save = TRUE,
  gtf = "/eqmoreaux/genomes/Homo_sapiens/Ensembl/GRCh37/Annotation/Genes/genes.gtf",
  pairedEnd = TRUE, ignore.strand = FALSE, count.mode = "Union",
  thread = 10)

Arguments

bam
a vector of bam files (in the same directory) or a directory containing one or more paths to bam files. if NULL, BAM files in the current working directory are choosed.
ext
BAM file extension. Default is ".bam". Used only when bam is a directory
by
One of "gene" (for counting in gene) or "exon" (for counting in exon)
samples.annotation
the path to "samples.txt" tabulation file containing sample annotations. This file should contain at least 3 columns:
  • name: corresponding to sample name. It will be used to report the result
  • fastq1: the first fastq file name for paired-end sequencing
  • fastq2: the second fastq file name for paired-end sequencing. This is optional if single-end sequencing is used
result.dir
a directory to save the output.
save
logical value; if TRUE, the result is saved in result.dir.
gtf
gene annotation file.
pairedEnd
specify if the data are paired-end sequencing data. Default is TRUE.
ignore.strand
A logical indicating if strand should be considered when matching. if TRUE, allows minus strand reads to count in plus strand genes, and vice versa. Should be FALSE for stranded RNAsequencing.
count.mode
counting mode. Read ?GenomicAlignments::summarizeOverlaps. Default value is "Union". Reads that overlap any portion of exactly one feature are counted. Reads that overlap multiple features are discarded.
thread
Number of threads to be used. This depends to the available computer ressources.

Value

Return an object of class SummarizedExperiment

Details

Used Bioconductor packages:

  • GenomicFeatures to prepare the transcript database
  • Rsamtools to import SAM/BAM files in R
  • GenomicAlignments for read counting
  • BiocParallelfor parallel computing

Input files: BAM files. No need to sort the BAM files in Bioconductor version > 2.12.

Contents
